dublin_core.dcvalue: The Virtual Pathology Slide is an interactive microscope emulator that presents via the Internet or CD ROM a complete 15 53 mm x 11 61 mm digitalized tissue section The Virtual Pathology Slide mimics the use of a microscope in both the stepwise increase in magnification from 16x up to 2000x and in lateral motion in the X and Y Cartesian directions This permits a pathologist to navigate to any area on a slide at any magnification similar to a conventional microscope
Development and evaluation of the virtual pathology slide: a new tool in telepathology.
